title: DBMS Level 7 â€” SQL Aggregation & GROUP BY
intro: This level focuses on aggregate functions and grouping of data.
points: Use aggregate functions: COUNT, SUM, AVG, MIN, MAX.
Understand GROUP BY to group rows before applying aggregates.
Use HAVING to filter groups after aggregation.
Difference between WHERE (filters rows) and HAVING (filters groups).
Common examples: total salary per department, count of students per branch.
